title: 03/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to LeBron James suffering an ankle injury that will put him on the sidelines for weeks and why this isn’t necessarily bad news for the Lakers and their championship hopes. He also tells you which quarterback is going to be under a ton of pressure heading into next season based on the moves this team made in free agency. Colin shares why he was right about Russell Wilson the whole time and why he was wrong about one star receiver in the NFL. Finally, NFL insider Albert Breer joins the show to talk about the Patriots plan at quarterback and if we should expect them to make a big move up to take a star prospect in the draft.
